version_description: The Meccanoid app now contains help screens to guide new users in the use of the app with the Meccanoid robot.  These help screens will appear when the user opens the app for the first time and enters each individual screen.  Additionally the user can tap

Use a visual programming language to make your Meccanoid do whatever you want. Save and load any number of behaviors!

-- Triggers: continue program flow once a servo has been moved a set number of degrees, or use a chest button to continue program

Removal of the requirement to log in.

Support for running the Meccanoid app within the Meccano App.
